name: JFrogDocker
description: Pull and push docker images from and to Artifactory (while allowing to collect build-info) or scan local docker images with JFrog Xray.
author: JFrog

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The docker command to be run by this task.

inputs.name: xrayConnection
inputs.label: Xray service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Xray service to be used by this task. Used by the 'Scan' command only. (This functionality requires version 3.40.0 or above of JFrog Xray)

inputs.name: artifactoryConnection
inputs.label: Artifactory service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory service to be used by this task. Used by the 'Pull' and 'Push' commands only. (This functionality requires version 7.33.3 or above of Artifactory)

inputs.name: watchesSource
inputs.label: Xray Watches Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the source to obtain Xray watches, to determine Xray's violations creation.

inputs.name: watches
inputs.label: Xray watches list
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of Xray watches, to determine Xray's violations creation.

inputs.name: repoPath
inputs.label: Artifactory Repository Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target repo path, to enable Xray to determine watches accordingly.

inputs.name: licenses
inputs.label: Show licenses
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you'd also like to show licenses information for the project dependencies.

inputs.name: allowFailBuild
inputs.label: Allow fail build
inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck if you do not wish to fail the build, following rules with 'Fail Build' actions.

inputs.name: collectBuildInfo
inputs.label: Collect build info
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Select to collect build info and store it locally.
The build info can be later published to Artifactory using the "JFrog Publish Build Info" task.

inputs.name: buildName
inputs.label: Build name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build name.
To use the default build name of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.DefinitionName)'.
The collected build-info should be published to Artifactory using the 'JFrog Publish Build Info' task.

inputs.name: buildNumber
inputs.label: Build number
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Build number.
To use the default build number of the pipeline, set the field to '$(Build.BuildNumber)'.
The collected build-info should be published to Artifactory using the 'JFrog Publish Build Info' task.

inputs.name: module
inputs.label: Module name
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Module name.
Optional module name for the build-info.
The collected build-info should be published to Artifactory using the 'JFrog Publish Build Info' task.

inputs.name: includeEnvVars
inputs.label: Include environment variables
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to include environment variables in the published build info.

inputs.name: threads
inputs.label: # of threads
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of parallel threads that should be used.

inputs.name: skipLogin
inputs.label: Skip Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select if you'd like the command to skip performing docker login.
